Copyright Law Royal Decree No M Rajab Page Article Definitions The following terms wherever used in this Law shall have the meanings following them unless the context requires otherwise. Work Any literary scientific or artistic work. Joint Work A work composed by two or more natural or corporate persons whether the contribution of each is separable or not. Collective Work The work collectively composed by a group at the instruction of a person natural or corporate who undertakes its. Audio Work
